page.title: 10My Mum's Day
page.content: On a normal day my Mum gets up at 7:00 am to get my breakfast ready.She wakes me up at 7:55 am.Soon it is time for her to set off for work.She gets her bags ready and then she sets off with Mrs.Johnson in the car.The first thing she has to do is check all the chickens have water and grain.Mum works at Pyewipe poultry farm.At 12:00 pm she goes into the canteen to have her sandwiches and have a chat with her workmates.After that she starts work again.She loads chickens onto lorries.After a hard day's work she comes home.The first thing she does is make a cup of tea.Then she sets off upstairs to run a bath.After she has relaxed for a while she starts to cook Dad's and my tea.When we have finished our tea Mum washes up the pots.Dad helps her by drying them.Then Mum watches TV until bedtime.
